content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill is not connected to any furnace

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab
Consists of lab at position with no connected entities

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
-  Ensure the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities before connecting pipes
-  Make sure the pipe connection points are within the range of the pipe entity
-  Ensure the fluid system of the pipe is compatible with the fluid system of the entity being connected

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the burner mining drill is fueled before starting the mining operation
-  Ensure the burner mining drill is connected to a furnace or other entity to process the mined resources

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients before starting the smelting operation
-  Ensure the furnace is fueled before starting the smelting operation

### Errors when using chests
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to insert items into it
-  Ensure the chest is connected to a burner inserter or other entity to process the items in the chest
